question: Show me all orders from last week with products created after 2016-12-20
query:
source=ecommerce
| where order_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
| where products.created_on >= '2016-12-20'
| fields customer_full_name, order_date, products.product_name, products.created_on

question: Show me all orders with products created after 2016-12-20
query:
source=ecommerce
| where products.created_on >= '2016-12-20'
| fields customer_full_name, order_date, products.product_name, products.created_on
